name: claude-code-statusline
description: Enhanced statusline for Claude Code with universal bash compatibility, comprehensive monitoring and beautiful themes

scripts.lint:all: npm run lint && npm run lint:tests
scripts.setup:bats: git submodule update --init --recursive || echo 'Note: Install bats-core manually if needed'
scripts.clean: npm run clean:processes && rm -f tests/**/*.log /tmp/.claude_* && rm -rf /tmp/statusline_test_*
scripts.clean:processes: pkill -f 'statusline_test_.*mock_bin' || true; ps aux | grep -E '/tmp/statusline_test.*date' | grep -v grep | awk '{print $2}' | xargs -r kill -9 || true
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run test
scripts.ci: npm run lint:all && npm run test

author: The Rector
